price: Il dit : "Ô mon Seigneur !  Parce que Tu m’as induit en erreur, eh bien je leur enjoliverai la vie sur terre et les égarerai tous,
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ بِمَآ أَغۡوَيۡتَنِي لَأُزَيِّنَنَّ لَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَأُغۡوِيَنَّهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi bimā aghwaytanī la-uzayyinanna lahum fī al-arḍi wala-ugh'wiyannahum ajmaʿīna
